long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reatix is an extension to make it easier to comment on a Netflix show you are watching. just open the extension while you are watching a tv show or movie on Netflix and type in a comment, press comment and it will open a twitter window with your comment and 2 special hashtags which allow the system to link you comment to that exact part of the show or movie. you can view others comments by clicking the "view comments" button. This app is still in beta and does not have all its features yet. when commenting your tweet will mention @ReatixApp which will allow your comments to appear on the extension itself in the future, do not remove the mention. Thank you for using my extension and if you have any feedback click the Info button and at the bottom click "give feedback"
